name: Saya Kawamoto
description: {{nihongo|'''Saya Kawamoto'''|川本 紗矢|Kawamoto Saya|born 31 August 1998}} is a Japanese [[tarento]] and [[actress]]. She is a former member of the [[Japanese idol]] [[girl group]] [[AKB48]]. She was a member of AKB48's Team 4 and was in [[JKT48]]'s Team T due to a member exchange program that happened between 15 September and 19 October 2018.
